short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract color palettes from any images on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Palitra is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to easily extract color palettes from any image on a webpage. With just a few clicks, you can access the dominant colors used in an image and use them as inspiration for your own design projects.

Key Features:
1) Extract color palettes from any image on a webpage
2) Click the extension icon to turn it on, click again to turn it off
3) Move your mouse over any image on the page to see its color palette
4) Click on any color in the palette to copy its hex code to your clipboard

Whether you're a designer, developer, or simply someone who loves color, Palitra is an indispensable tool for quickly gathering color inspiration from the web. Use it to create beautiful color schemes, match brand colors, or simply explore the world of color in a new way.
